mapper.select: select cc.* ,a.nickname as nickname from t_customize_comment cc left join t_account a on cc.creator=a.id where cc.designer_id=#{designerId} and cc.is_delete=#{isDelete} order by cc.created_time desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_customize_comment where designer_id=#{designerId} and is_delete=#{isDelete}
mapper.insert: insert into t_customize_comment ( id,created_time ,order_id ,content ,quality_score ,efficiency_score ,service_score ,creator ,positive ,moderate ,negative ,is_delete ,designer_id ) values ( id,now() ,#{orderId} ,#{content} ,#{qualityScore} ,#{efficiencyScore} ,#{serviceScore} ,#{creator} ,#{positive} ,#{moderate} ,#{negative} ,#{isDelete} ,#{designerId} )
mapper.select: SELECT avg(efficiency_score) as efficiencyScore,avg(quality_score) as qualityScore,avg(service_score) as serviceScore FROM t_customize_comment WHERE designer_id=#{designerId} and is_delete=#{isDelete}
select count(id) from t_customize_comment where designer_id=#{designerId} and is_delete=0 and positive=1
select count(id) from t_customize_comment where designer_id=#{designerId} and is_delete=0
select * from t_customize_comment where 1=1 and id=#{id} and order_id=#{orderId}
